MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8.08PM in the CW5 postcode area of Checkley due to a fault on our overhead line network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.11PM on 9th February 2021.
